parameters.name: BurstStatus
parameters.description: This parameter is set to **disabled** if the assured serverless feature is disabled.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of requests and prevent repeated requests from being submitted. You can use the client to generate the value, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: CpuEnlargeThreshold
parameters.description: The CPU utilization threshold for **scale-out**. Valid values: 60 to 90. Unit: %.

parameters.name: CpuShrinkThreshold
parameters.description: The CPU utilization threshold for **scale-in**. Valid values: 30 to 55. Unit: %.

parameters.name: CrontabJobId
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.

parameters.name: MemoryEnlargeThreshold
parameters.description: The memory usage threshold for **scale-out**. Valid values: 60 to 90. Unit: %.

parameters.name: MemoryShrinkThreshold
parameters.description: The memory usage threshold for **scale-in**. Valid values: 30 to 55. Unit: %.

parameters.name: ScaleMaxCpus
parameters.description: The maximum number of CPU cores for elastic scaling. The maximum value cannot exceed twice the initial CPU configuration.

parameters.name: ScaleMaxMemory
parameters.description: The maximum memory for elastic scaling. The value cannot exceed twice the instance's initial memory size. Unit: GB. Step size: 2 GB.

parameters.name: SwitchTime
parameters.description:
The time when the specified entry takes effect. The time follows the ISO 8601 standard in the `yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ` format. The time is displayed in UTC.

>  This parameter is required only if **SwitchTimeMode** is set to **2**.

parameters.name: SwitchTimeMode
parameters.description:
The effective policy. Valid values:

*   **0**: Immediately takes effect.
*   **1**: Takes effect within the maintenance window. You can call the **ModifyDBInstanceMaintainTime** operation to change the maintenance window of an instance.
*   **2**: Takes effect at a specified point in time.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The reserved parameter. This parameter is not supported.
